# Scripts

Bundled resources for recommendation-engine skill

- [x] build_collaborative_filtering.py: Automates the creation of a collaborative filtering recommendation engine.
- [x] build_content_based_filtering.py: Automates the creation of a content-based filtering recommendation engine.
- [x] evaluate_recommender.py: Evaluates the performance of the recommendation engine using metrics like precision, recall, and NDCG.
- [x] data_preprocessing.py: Script to preprocess the user-item interaction data.
